name: Lunaquest (itch)
description:
Lunaquest is a game about a girl who was born in Hell, and also about selling blood to demonic monstrosities and paying taxes.

long story short it's a video game that can be played with your hands (or other appendages if that's what crinkles your wrap). it's made in rpg maker but doesn't use default graphics.

warning: this game has lots and lots of eyes all over and they are mandatory. if you are colorblind this game may be a problem because there are not very many colors in it.

FEATURES:

  • triangle man
  • eyeball on a tentacle
  • worms
  • worms
  • almost two whole humans
  • 1 playable game

(Currently in active development. Lots of things are still unbalanced or just not in the game. There's no music yet, and nearly everything is subject to potential change. But check it out if you're curious!)
